channel.title: Comments on: For those who don't think IdeaJam is being watched

item.title: By: Tim Lorge
item.dc:creator: Tim Lorge
item.description: <p>C'mon ... you just aren't hip in the Lotus world if you don't dig Planet Lotus and IdeaJam!!! <br /><br />Which reminds me ... When's Yancy going to add the IdeaJam feed to the PL page? Uhhh ... am I stepping on toes???? Perhaps I'll start my own Jam on that.</p>
item.content:encoded:
C’mon … you just aren’t hip in the Lotus world if you don’t dig Planet Lotus and IdeaJam!!!

Which reminds me … When’s Yancy going to add the IdeaJam feed to the PL page? Uhhh … am I stepping on toes???? Perhaps I’ll start my own Jam on that.
